Brand: Erleia

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Brand: Erleia

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Organic Prunus Amygdalus (Almond) Oil, Organic Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Oil, Organic Rosa Canina L. (Rose Hip) Oil, Organic Citrus Limonum (Lemon) Essential Oil, Organic Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Essential Oil, Camellia Sinensis (Green Tea) Leaf Extract
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
